record.text:
🚨UPDATE: “Kettles continue their assault. Villagers are left to flee for their lives. Reports of widespread panic and minor scaldings. More updates to come.” -Ax 
#kettleocalypse #ontheground
-TIP TOP TODDY TOooOWeeee TIP TOP TODDY CUP O' TEA TIP TOP TODDY TOooOWEeee-

dozens of townsfolk are now here, hiding in The Big Tree.

I didnt know the Blue Wizard could move so fast. He saved many! 

He looks so exhausted now...
That's just the mud caked on his face

I'm here in my favourite place, The Big Tree, heavenly Mother Arulioanthular!

And with old faces and new faces (some hard to tell given the boiling water), old friends and new friends.

And two heros: @mervastra.bsky.social and @thebluewizard.bsky.social 

I shall not forget this wondrous day!

🚨UPDATE: A dramatic turn of events within the last hour. 

The situation was dire, with the villagers corralled into a kind of mud pit, the kettles relentlessly pouring lukewarm tea water into the pit. 

1/2

The Blue Wizard and his apprentice Marv appeared on the scene and began a frost chant at the water inside the kettles.

While the kettles crashed to the ground, laden with internal blocks of ice, the Blue Wizard led the villagers away to safety.

You heard it here first—it's extraordinary!

2/2

Overblown nonsense, I was there

The Blue Wizard did appear, but tripped over his cape and face planted in the mud while his slack-jawed boy stood there drooling

A real Wizard appeared in the shadows and took down those kettles

True heroes don't seek headlines -- we may never know their identity

In gloomy times 
I must remind
That it might get wetter
Before it gets better
So warm a mug
And come here for a hug!
I'm so sorry about your family.
🥰 beams of love and light to you ☀️
w/her7e ar;e p-e^op5le

The kettles have grown in number, and in power.

Their relentless banging and chanting has increased overnight.

I cast a really good spell on the door, though - it holds, for now!

value.text: -TIP TOP TODDY TOooOWeeee TIP TOP TODDY CUP O' TEA TIP TOP TODDY TOooOWEeee-

record.text:
🥰😇
Being trapped in The Big Tree, and having my family die yesterday has really caused me to reflect on life, and love.
🥰😇

I think i was meant to write a book! I am going to be an author! Either a book of poems, or a cookbook. 

Vibrations of 💓
no f3r.iends 😞

Thank you for contacting the office of The Green Wizard. I am out of the office until the third blood moon. 

Taking a well-earned retreat from Council duties at the Obsidian Spas. No philanthropy or council business -- just relaxation. 

Direct urgent matters to @thebluewizard.bsky.social
By the elders...
I would but we are pinned down, trapped in The Big Tree!
Is your village inhabited solely by cowards? Will no one accept this mission?

I caught a small, pretty gross looking bug and whispered a request to find someone, anyone to help. 

It was like a beatle or something.

Make haste, little gross beatle!
It is written.
